roleset.name: make efficient

OPTIMIZATION-N NOTES: Based on temprel data. Comparison to optimize.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from optimization.01-n)
OPTIMIZED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from optimized.01-j)

example.name: infinitive, subject control
example.text: - - [*] Continue [*]to optimize the hard environment [*RNR*-70] and softenvironment [*RNR*-70] of investment .
example.arg: [ the hard environment [*RNR*-70] and soft environment[*RNR*-70]][ of investment]
